newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Whirlpool, Q4 rumours push up Electrolux.
newsitem.headline: Whirlpool, Q4 rumours push up Electrolux.

text.p: Appliance maker Electrolux rose after U.S. rival Whirlpool Corp's earnings report overnight and on rumours about structural changes within the company.
At 1210 GMT the share traded at 439.5 crowns, up 6.5 on Wednesday's close.
One broker said a rumour that Electrolux would sell its Granges unit was circulating on the market.
"There's a rumour that something is going to happen in the company," one broker said.
Whirlpool on Tuesday reported a sharp rebound in earnings for the latest quarter because of "outstanding" gains in North American and Latin American markets.
Electrolux is due to publish its 1996 earnings report on January 24.
